programme.title: The Rugrats Movie
programme.desc: Tommy and his plucky pals go on a forest adventure in his fathers latest invention, the Reptar Wagon.

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: The children and their bickering family are stranded on a desert island. Fortunately help is at hand from the Thornberry family, who are visiting the island to film a rare snow leopard. Once again, animal-understanding Eliza saves the day.

programme.title: The Ogglies
programme.desc: Young Max meets the Ogglies, a family of green, garbage-eating creatures who live at the dump in the town of Smelliville. When a contractor plans to build a wellness temple at the dump, Max and his pal must hatch a plan to save the Ogglies home.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: Poppy, the optimistic leader of the trolls, and Branch, her polar opposite, embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world theyve ever known.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens
programme.desc: When an evil alien attacks the Earth, a motley crew of monsters is called into action to save the world from imminent destruction. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Son of Memphis and Norma, little sweet penguin Mumble has a big problem: he cant sing a single note. In a world where everyone needs a heart song to attract a soul mate, Mumble feels he doesnt belong there. Our hero Mumble is the worst singer in the world, but he can tap dance brilliantly.

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Mumbles son Erik hasnt yet found his talents, and he goes with his friends to Adelie-land which is ruled by a penguin who can fly. When Erik returns to Emperor-land and finds them trapped under big walls of ice. Will Erik be able to save his family and friends before it is too late?

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: The Ogglies

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.desc: Maurice is a streetwise ginger cat who comes up with a money-making scam by befriending a group of self-taught talking rats. When Maurice and the rodents meet a bookworm called Malicia, their little con soon goes down the drain.

programme.title: Teen Titans GO! to the Movies
programme.desc: With a few madcap ideas and a song in their hearts, the Teen Titans head to Hollywood to fulfill their dreams. Things soon go awry, however, when a supervillain plans to take over the planet, putting the very fate of the young heroes on the line.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: After he accidentally destroys the winter food supply of his fellow Liberty Park residents, Surly, a squirrel, is banished to the streets of Oakton. Luckily, Surly finds the towns nut shop and hatches a plan to plunder its bounty. However, unbeknown to Surly and his ragtag team of animal associates, the nut shop is really a front for mobsters who plan to rob the bank next door. While Surly and his team break in to the shop, the mobsters carry out their own scheme.

programme.title: The 90s: Cinemas Greatest Decade
programme.desc: Alex Zane and celebrity film fans go back to the 90s to celebrate some of the decades greatest films, from classic comedies to epic blockbusters.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Were the Millers
programme.desc: Indebted to a big-time drug lord, a pot dealer travels to Mexico with a fake family and a camper to pick up a large shipment and smuggle it into the U.S.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Anyone but You
programme.desc: Despite having an amazing first date, Bea and Bens initial attraction quickly turns sour. When they unexpectedly find themselves at a destination wedding in Australia, the pair pretend to be the perfect couple to keep up appearances.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Empire Waist
programme.desc: Lenore is a plus-sized teenager who gets forced into the spotlight when her classmate discovers her talent for fashion. However, the fears of her image-conscious mother and Lenores own insecurities prevent her from wearing her own designs.

programme.title: The 90s: Cinemas Greatest Decade
programme.desc: Alex Zane and celebrity film fans go back to the 90s to celebrate some of the decades greatest films, from classic comedies to epic blockbusters.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Empire Waist
programme.desc: Lenore is a plus-sized teenager who gets forced into the spotlight when her classmate discovers her talent for fashion. However, the fears of her image-conscious mother and Lenores own insecurities prevent her from wearing her own designs.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: Young at Heart
programme.desc: Laurie Tuttle and Barney Sloan fall in love despite the presence of her fiance, Alex Burke. Sloan is a musician called in to score a comedy Burke is writing who steals Tuttles heart, but since she has two equally attractive sisters, a happy ending is guaranteed.

programme.title: Chuck Chuck Baby
programme.desc: Helen lives with her ex-husband, his 20-year-old girlfriend, their new baby and his dying mother. Her dreary life is interrupted when her schoolgirl crush arrives back in town.

programme.title: The Convert
programme.desc: A lay preachers violent past is drawn into question and his faith tested as he becomes caught up in a bloody war between Maori tribes after arriving at a British settlement in the 1830s.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: I Used to Be Funny
programme.desc: Comedian Sam struggles with PTSD, and considers joining the search for a missing teenage girl.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Germany advances into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. Under air and ground cover from British and French forces, troops are slowly and methodically evacuated from the beach using every vessel that can be found.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Bernard Jordan, a World War II veteran, sneaks out of his care home to attend the 70th anniversary commemoration of the D-Day landings in Normandy.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Now
programme.desc: In the third of the `Look Whos Talking comedies, two dogs enter the Umbriacco household - and take an immediate dislike to each other. When Molly loses her job, husband James is forced to take on a demanding role as private airline pilot. The children miss him, so he buys a dog to cheer them up. However, when Jamess glamorous boss asks his family to look after her poodle, sparks fly between the dogs.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: The Money Pit
programme.desc: An up-and-coming entertainment lawyer Walter Fielding takes the big step with his girlfriend and purchases a fixer-upper for a `steal. As it turns out, the `steal is really a `rip-off and everything that can go wrong, does.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friends killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Mob Land
programme.desc: In a small town struggling with addiction, a local sheriff tries to maintain the peace when desperate family man Shelby robs a pill mill. The supposedly easy score takes a violent turn, alerting the New Orleans mafias revenge-seeking enforcer.

programme.title: Dorian Gray
programme.desc: When a naïve young Dorian arrives in Victorian London, he is swept into a social whirlwind by the charismatic Lord Wotton, who introduces Dorian to the pleasures of the city. Henrys friend Basil Hallward paints a portrait of Dorian to capture the full power of his youthful beauty. When the portrait is unveiled, Dorian makes a flippant pledge: he would give anything to stay as he is in the picture - even his soul.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: When a new student joins her colleges female a cappella group, she takes the women out of their comfort zone of traditional pieces and introduces them to innovative arrangements.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music one last time.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Hard-drinking country music star Jackson Maine discovers, and falls in love with, a struggling but talented singer named Ally. As her career quickly takes off, Jackson starts to realize that his best days may be behind him.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: The Prosecutor
programme.desc: A poor young man is wrongly charged with drug trafficking after being deceived. An ex-prosecutor investigates the case, uncovers a corrupt lawyer teams scheme, and restores justice despite obstruction from evil forces.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: A sudden attack by Wulf, a ruthless Dunlending lord, forces Helm Hammerhand and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg. Finding herself in a desperate situation, Helms daughter must lead the resistance.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: Danny, an ex-soldier homeless in Dublin, meets Will, a teen fleeing a drug gang. Their encounter forces them to confront their pasts while navigating the harsh realities they face.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A man revisits his childhood beach to surf with his son. Humiliated by locals, he becomes entangled in an escalating conflict that pushes him to his limits.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Videodrome
programme.desc: A television executive searching for the ultimate show for his sex-based network comes across `Videodrome, a pirate broadcast of what appears to be pornographic snuff films. Trying to track down the makers, he enters a world of extreme sex and violence in one of David Cronenbergs early films that, while explicit, also satirises the media industry and its attempts at mind-control.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: 47 Meters Down
programme.desc: Two sisters vacationing in Mexico become trapped in a shark cage on the ocean floor. As their oxygen starts to run out and with great white sharks circling them, the sisters must find a way to get to the surface alive.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station when a worldwide conflict breaks out on Earth. Soon, the U.S. and Russian astronauts each receive orders from the ground: take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Dual
programme.desc: Upon receiving a terminal diagnosis, Sarah opts for a cloning procedure to ease her loss on her friends and family. When she makes a miraculous recovery, her attempts to decommission her clone fail, leading to a court-mandated duel to the death.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Curtis and his family are selected to test a revolutionary new device called AIA that takes smart homes to the next level. As AIA begins to learn everyones behaviour and anticipate their needs, it makes sure nothing and no one gets in their way.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Riddick

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Gravity

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A possessed doll that was purchased for their new born child creates havoc, and destroys a young couples lives.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their daughter, a former toy maker and his wife welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their farmhouse. Terror soon strikes when one child finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Clever Kids
programme.desc: Featuring a list of movies with clever kids.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. Jones needs to deliver the skull to its rightful place, but Soviet agents who are trailing Jones have other plans which will endanger the West if the artefact falls into their hands.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Comic-book adventure about a stunt motorcyclist tricked into making a pact with Mephistopheles. The rider can only escape doing the demons bidding if he agrees to battle the dark lords son. To this end, he assumes the identity of the supernatural Ghost Rider, a terrifying night-time vigilante with a flaming skull.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Though the Nazis fail to open the gates of Hell, one little devil gets through. Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent must contend with a swarm of deadly serpents that have been released aboard an airliner to kill the witness he is escorting to trial.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Based on three hybridising narrative strands, three groups of villains are intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Turkish and Tommy team up with a pugilistic Irish gypsy named Mickey for the purpose of rigging unlicensed boxing matches. However, their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. To complicate further, a New York gangster arrives on the scene.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Harlem drug dealer Frank Lucas rises to power in corrupt 1970s New York, equalling and surpassing the notorious Mafia families with the reach of his empire. On the other side of the law, honest cop Richie Roberts dedicates himself to taking down `the most dangerous man walking the streets. Lucas acts with impunity, smuggling heroin into the US in the coffins of American soldiers killed in Vietnam.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: The curator of the Louvre museum is murdered, leaving behind a chain of obscure clues to a world-changing secret. Cryptologist Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon embark on a race against time to uncover the precious truth before it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: A car crash leaves a playboy maimed and charged with murder in this remake of the mind-bending film `Abre los Ojos.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky

Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent must contend with a swarm of deadly serpents that have been released aboard an airliner to kill the witness he is escorting to trial.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Based on three hybridising narrative strands, three groups of villains are intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Turkish and Tommy team up with a pugilistic Irish gypsy named Mickey for the purpose of rigging unlicensed boxing matches. However, their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. To complicate further, a New York gangster arrives on the scene.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Harlem drug dealer Frank Lucas rises to power in corrupt 1970s New York, equalling and surpassing the notorious Mafia families with the reach of his empire. On the other side of the law, honest cop Richie Roberts dedicates himself to taking down `the most dangerous man walking the streets. Lucas acts with impunity, smuggling heroin into the US in the coffins of American soldiers killed in Vietnam.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: The curator of the Louvre museum is murdered, leaving behind a chain of obscure clues to a world-changing secret. Cryptologist Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon embark on a race against time to uncover the precious truth before it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: A car crash leaves a playboy maimed and charged with murder in this remake of the mind-bending film `Abre los Ojos.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in Americas former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: While visiting London with his family, Jack Ryan foils an IRA attempt to assassinate a government minister, killing one of the attackers in the process. Swearing vengeance, the IRAs Sean Miller follows Ryan and his family to their seaside home in America where he and his followers plan to exact their revenge.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like its finally working - thanks to the round goby. programme.desc: Eddie shares his love of astronomy with Akil during an evening of stargazing. They spot constellations and planets, and Eddie learns to share his special interest.

programme.desc: Toms parents are having a big clear out, and hes worried they will get rid of his favourite stuff. Liz doodles a bug jigsaw.

programme.title: Silly Animals
programme.desc: From an opera singing chick to a gorilla stand-up comedian and a bird magician called Gavin, Gary the vlogging dog and his friend Rat try in vain to unearth some clips of talented animals.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Woolly monkey Piquita requires an operation, new capuchin Louis gets a lovely perch, while the chimp team find themselves trying to navigate a double blow after two sad losses.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison visits Twycross Zoo to collect an orphaned orangutan in need of a new home, plus there is some startling news about a capuchin recently rescued from a life in the pet trade.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When Lisa joins the high school marching band, she finds an unlikely mentor in Shauna Chalmers; Homer becomes a craft beer brewer.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A surprise from Marges past has her bonding with Bart and terrifying Homer.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Grampa finds himself in a pickle when his hidden hamburger past comes back to haunt him.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After Bart humiliates him at church, Homer finally teaches his son to admire his dad - until a visit from a magical, singing janitor changes everything.

programme.title: Africas Hunters
programme.desc: The misfit of the family has been bullied by his brothers and rejected by his mother.

programme.desc: Tori investigates the remains of children and teenagers found in the car park of the Victoria Gate shopping centre in Leeds.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austrias crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: The Paper
programme.desc: In Toledo, Ohio, a documentary crew focuses its efforts on `The Truth Teller, a historic but declining Midwestern newspaper trying to resurrect itself with volunteer reporters. Following the lives and struggles of dreamers in love with journalism.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight must overcome his fear of public speaking when he is named Dunder-Mifflins Salesman of the Year, and turns to Michael for help. Meanwhile, Jim plans to escape Scranton to avoid Pams wedding.

programme.title: The Office
programme.sub-title: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.desc: A routine office day is upended when children descend upon Dunder Mifflin for Take Your Daughter to Work Day. Michael is surprised when he strikes up a friendship with the five-year-old daughter of his sworn enemy, Toby.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Its a difficult time for Kevin as he awaits his test results. All the staff rally round in support, although this does put a damper on Michaels self-thrown birthday party. So he takes the gang ice skating instead, but Jim and Pam slip away to find a present for Kevin.

programme.title: The Force: North East
programme.desc: A trail of blood leaves officers puzzled. A man high on drink and drugs launches a tirade of abuse and a domestic fight leads to an arrest.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: The Thames Valley Police provide insight into car crime and video of dangerous drivers in action.

programme.title: Monkey Life

programme.desc: Eddie must return his beloved Mars Rover book to the library. Dad helps him find an exciting new book about UFOs to borrow and enjoy at home.

programme.title: The Brilliant World of Tom Gates 2

programme.title: Silly Animals
programme.desc: Gary the vlogging dog and his friend Rat try making animal TV shows, from a physical gameshow with lion cubs falling off logs to a celebrity jungle survival show hosted by two silly Macaques.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: The park comes to the aid of two marmosets, leaving Alison shocked by the condition of the male, while Louisa reaches out the foot of friendship to male crush Matty the capuchin.

programme.desc: A challenging trip into the great outdoors awaits some of the lorises from the park, and two black-shanked douc monkeys have quite the adventure in store for them in Vietnam.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: When Hondo learns theres a $1 million bounty on his head, 20-Squad must race to uncover the mysterious enemy from Hondos past whos intent on revenge; Deacon and Tan butt heads over Tans changes to SWAT academy.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: When Carmela gets to hear certain intimate details of Junior and his long-term girlfriend Roberta `Bobbi Sanfillipos love life, she shares them with an amused Tony. Now nephew and uncle know each others dangerous secrets, and the two exchange innuendoes during a not-so-friendly golf game. Junior is so angry he considers having Tony clipped. Meanwhile, one of Meadows soccer team-mates attempts suicide.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony and crew rob and kill a Colombian drug dealer doing business in Soprano territory. As the New Jersey mobsters celebrate their sudden windfall with champagne and women, Christopher takes girlfriend Adriana to New York for dinner and a play. They meet gangsta-rap musician Massive Genius and are invited to a party at his home. Massive is interested in a meeting with Tonys friend Hesh.

programme.desc: JJ and Sugars joyous celebrations turn into a morbid affair after the gang learns of some sad news.

programme.desc: Theres only one Judge Judy! With her outspoken style and hard-hitting decisiveness, Judge Judy single-handedly sorts out family disputes and misdemeanours, one case at a time.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A young man says his former friend entered his home in the middle of the night and hit him in the head with a bottle.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Road Rage Slam!; Bunk Bed Blowup
programme.desc: A woman accused of smashing a motorists windshield with a hammer yells at the judge when the verdict does not go her way; ex-lovers feud over money, disability and the cost of childrens beds.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A yoga studio owner says she was scammed and kicked out after investing in a gym. A woman wants her ex-fiance to pay back the money she invested in his restaurant.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Malicious Skateboarder?; Too Young to Live Alone
programme.desc: An adult cyclist files criminal charges against an 11-year-old he accuses of throwing a skateboard under his bike; a woman sues her childhood friend for breaking their lease.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Emotional Vandal Pulls a Knife?!; Birthday Corvette and Abandoned Dogs?!; The Court Cant Help You!
programme.desc: A landlord claims one of his tenants attacked his home with a knife, a woman sues her ex-boyfriend for the theft of a Corvette, and the judge denies a womans repayment attempt from an ex-friend.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable Semi-Nude Photo Post?!; Quinceanera Loan or Friendly Contribution?; Law Student Should Know Better!
programme.desc: A man claims he sent a photo of his wife to his ex-girlfriend, A family friend pays for a girls birthday party, but expects to be paid back. And the judge reprimands a second-year law student.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Winner Winner Chicken Dinner!; Those Are Not My Texts!
programme.desc: A gambler wins a cruise but makes the wrong choice in travelling companions. A woman insists that her former friend is fabricating texts when she tries to collect on a debt.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Judge Judy hears from a woman who accuses her boyfriends ex of ramming her car, before kicking it and harassing her.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Dog Abuse vs. Puppy Deaths?!; High Kick to Antique Dresser?!; Show Me Proof of Internal Bruising!
programme.desc: A teenager enters into her first dog-breeding contract only to be accused of abuse, police are called when a man reportedly kicks his landlords dresser, and a woman and her wife accuse a former roommate of assault.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: House Flipping Scam Artist?!; Pit Bull Mix Goes for Womans Throat?!; Unfair Child Support!
programme.desc: A man claims to have lost thousands of dollars while trying to get into the house-flipping business, a woman says she was attacked by a dog on a friends property, and a father is reprimanded for allowing his ex-girlfriend to pay for child support.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Vandalism Excuse at Its Finest?!; Amazing Townhouse Profit?!
programme.desc: A woman claims she caught her estranged friend cutting down all the mobiles on her front porch. A woman sells her home for three times what she paid for it and then sues a previous tenant for repairs.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Big Bucks Fish Tank Botch?!; Lovers Lexus Mix-Up!
programme.desc: A custom fish tank arrives at its destination damaged. Plus, a man claims that his ex-lover fraudulently registered his car under her name.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Hair Stylist Left in the Dark?!; Solar Tree Trimming Disaster?!
programme.desc: A stylist whose works electricity was switched off claims all of her property was stolen. Plus, a married couple sue a solar power salesman for damages.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Woman Desperate for Degrading Job?!; The Infamous Afghanistan Scam?!
programme.desc: A generous friend steps in when a woman claims that she is willing to work as a paid escort to cover her overdue bills. A woman sends money to a man she has never met in person who says that he is trapped in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A trainer disputes the cost of a prosthetic leg for a horse; a teacher accuses her son of stealing and running up her phone bill.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A woman allegedly punches her boyfriend in the face after he calls his ex-girlfriend; a New Jersey family battles over custody of a child and dog.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A man accuses his neighbours children of harassing his son; a man sues a waitress for money he says he lent her to bail a friend out of jail.

programme.title: Storm of Suspicion
programme.desc: When a brutally stabbed body is discovered in the snow-covered foothills of the Oquirrh Mountains, police are left with scant evidence to determine Ron Petersons fate.

programme.title: Secrets of a Murder Detective
programme.desc: DI Keogh and DCS Whittaker probe Gary Deans murder. Insights from Bache and Langley reveal a feud, leading to the Dawsons conviction.

programme.title: Secrets of a Murder Detective
programme.desc: Detective Keogh and team uncover nurse Cobbs crimes of rape and manslaughter. Parallel investigations, drug evidence, and friends lead reveal all.

programme.title: Killers: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: In the UK, the dismembered body of a woman leaves a gay couple, obsessed by serial killers, in the frame. In the US, a hidden camera provides vital evidence to help bring justice to a family.

programme.title: Killers: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: In the United States, a missing 15-year-old is found by cadaver dogs. In the United Kingdom, a mystery needs to be solved in order to identify a dismembered body found in a suitcase.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: When Louise Dickey is discovered brutally murdered in a bath of her own blood, police are stumped. But, nearby surveillance cameras may lead to the shocking truth.

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: An extremely successful California career woman keeps falling ill and doctors cant determine why, then after she dies they still have no explanation until they find a key figure in her life has been lying about his past.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: The body of a 24-year-old criminology student is found wrapped in a blanket alongside a desolate road in Brooklyn, N.Y.; police discover that the bouncer at a bar is her killer.

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: A fishing trawler heads out to sea with three brothers and their ailing stepmother aboard. When it returns to Shipton Abbott harbour several hours later, only the three fishermen remain. A note found on deck suggests the woman took her own life. As her estranged daughter comes to town to help make funeral arrangements, the simple case grows more complex. Meanwhile, its the day of the house visit, but its no plain sailing for Humphrey and Martha.

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: When a priest from a Catholic boarding school suddenly disappears, Humphrey and Esther find that his case has uncanny similarities to a local myth - The Devil on the Rocks. Why was he last seen marching on a nearby beach in the middle of a dense fog, and where is he now? With the schools headmistress reluctant to aid the investigation, a large sum of money missing from the school safe, and the priest nowhere to be found, the team have their work cut out trying to pin down the truth.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: A royal residence beckons for Michael as he is treated to a behind-the-scenes tour of the worlds longest vine at Hampton Court Palace. Maintaining a royal theme, Michael is drawn to Esher to visit stately Claremont House, where tragic circumstances led directly to the birth of the Victorian era.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael begins the final leg of this journey through the home counties at Egham, where a perfectly preserved, historic steam fair offers the original white-knuckle ride. Across town lies the palatial Royal Holloway College, now part of the University of London, where Michael discovers the institutions philanthropic roots.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo experiences a terrifying victory roll in a World War II Spitfire, high above the most famous aerodrome of the Battle of Britain, Biggin Hill.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael makes his way to the beautiful Sussex village of Ditchling, where a Roman Catholic community of artists made their home. In the seaside town of Bexhill-on-Sea, Michael hears of the work of the wartime air raid precautions wardens.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: In Oklahoma, the guys uncover a baseball signed by one of the greatest players of all time.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Frank and Mike go in search of classic Indian and Harley motorcycles that became an iconic staple in American biker culture.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul and Charlie head south for an immaculate Lotus Super 7. Derek and Jack are in Sheffield collecting a 1929 Riley Monaco and a 1924 Alvis 12/50 tourer.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: The homes of Britain are stacked with unwanted possessions. Henry Cole and Simon OBrien are here to turn them into hard cash for their owners. The boys are in East Sussex, and their finds include some Victorian street lamps.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Experts Henry Cole and Simon OBrien travel the length of Britain to find, fix and flog unwanted possessions on behalf of their owners. A butter churn, a slot machine and a set of print trays are among the finds in this episode.

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: The time has come to say `Adieu, Adieu! as Rene, his lovely wife Edith and all the regulars finally bow out at the close of the war.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Replaced at work by a box, Victor embarks on his enforced retirement. As an erstwhile security officer, he finds it exasperatingly difficult to adapt to this directionless new existence, and he begins magnifying mundane aspects of everyday life into major dramas.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Margaret tries to help her husband cope with early retirement by getting him a book from the library entitled `Coping with Old Age. Maybe keep-fit classes at the local adult education centre will help take Victors mind off the depressing turn of events?

programme.desc: British Intelligence assigns an American the task of locating the headquarters of a neo-Nazi movement.

Is there any way this romance can end happily?
